bylaws

These are the rules that govern the James River Outdoor Coalition

View the Project on GitHub

  1. Notice of Meetings. Written notice stating the place, day and hour of the meeting, and, in the case of a special meeting, the purpose or purposes for which the meeting is called, shall be given by hand or by mail, electronic mail, telecopy or other form of wire or wireless communication, to each Member of record in good standing, not less than ten (10) days nor more than sixty (60) days before the date of the meeting.

This project is maintained by james-river-outdoor-coalition
